thread.title: Snoop Dogg is Launching a Cannabis Culture Site
thread.title_full: Snoop Dogg is Launching a Cannabis Culture Site

title: Snoop Dogg is Launching a Cannabis Culture Site
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
23 Sep 2015 06:27 AM EST 
Snoop Dogg has a new media startup! Can you guess what its focus is? Here's a hint: the company is named Merry Jane. That’s right, it’s a “cannabis lifestyle site.” Snoop and entrepreneur Ted Chung just announced the site at TechCrunch Disrupt, the technology and business conference in San Francisco. Chung, for his part, managed to make weed sound as dull as possible, using the phrase “cannabis space,” and explaining that Snoop had been “at the helm of this movement for his whole career, globally.”
